title: Nevada regulators order daily fantasy sports sites to shut down in state
text:
Home » News » Sports » Nevada regulators order daily… Nevada regulators order daily fantasy sports sites to shut down in state By The Associated Press October 15, 2015 6:58 pm 
LAS VEGAS (AP) — Nevada regulators order daily fantasy sports sites to shut down in state. Topics:
